alert.note: Alert for Crittenden; Mississippi (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 15 at 9:04PM CST until February 15 at 9:30PM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 930 PM CST FOR SOUTH CENTRAL MISSISSIPPI...NORTHEASTERN CRITTENDEN... SOUTHWESTERN TIPTON AND CENTRAL SHELBY COUNTIES... At 903 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near West Memphis, moving north at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... West Memphis, Marion, Millington, T O Fuller State Park, Meeman Shelby Forest State Park, Memphis, Munford, Edmondson, Sunset, Jericho, Southwest Memphis, Frayser, Dixonville, Downtown Memphis, Crittenden, Atoka, Clarkedale, Louise, Menesha and Woodstock. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
